verses.verse: <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is an <S%H1238>empty<s%> <S%H1612>vine,<s%> he <S%H7737>brings<s%> <S%H7737>forth<s%> <S%H6529>fruit<s%> to himself: according to the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of his <S%H6529>fruit<s%> he has <S%H7235>increased<s%> the <S%H4196>altars;<s%> according to the <S%H2896>goodness<s%> of his <S%H776>land<s%> they have made <S%H2896>goodly<s%> <S%H4676>images.<s%>

Their <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H2505>divided;<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> shall they be found <S%H816>faulty:<s%> he shall <S%H6202>break<s%> down their <S%H4196>altars,<s%> he shall <S%H7703>spoil<s%> their <S%H4676>images.<s%>

For <S%H6258>now<s%> they shall <S%H559>say,<s%> We have <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> we <S%H3372>feared<s%> not the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> then should a <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> to us?

They have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H1697>words,<s%> <S%H422>swearing<s%> <S%H7723>falsely<s%> in <S%H3772>making<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant:<s%> thus <S%H4941>judgment<s%> <S%H6524>springs<s%> up as <S%H7219>hemlock<s%> in the <S%H8525>furrows<s%> of the <S%H7704>field.<s%>

The <S%H7934>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> shall <S%H1481>fear<s%> because of the <S%H5697>calves<s%> of <S%H1007>Bethaven:<s%> for the <S%H5971>people<s%> thereof shall <S%H56>mourn<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> it, and the <S%H3649>priests<s%> thereof that <S%H1523>rejoiced<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> it, for the <S%H3519>glory<s%> thereof, <S%H3588>because<s%> it is <S%H1540>departed<s%> from it.

It shall be <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H2986>carried<s%> to <S%H804>Assyria<s%> for a <S%H4503>present<s%> to <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3377>Jareb:<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> shall <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H1317>shame,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> of his own <S%H6098>counsel.<s%>
As for <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> her <S%H4428>king<s%> is <S%H1820>cut<s%> off as the <S%H7110>foam<s%> on the <S%H4325>water.<s%>

The <S%H1116>high<s%> places also of <S%H206>Aven,<s%> the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> shall be <S%H8045>destroyed:<s%> the <S%H6975>thorn<s%> and the <S%H1863>thistle<s%> shall <S%H5927>come<s%> up <S%H5921>on<s%> their <S%H4196>altars;<s%> and they shall <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> <S%H3680>Cover<s%> us; and to the <S%H1389>hills,<s%> <S%H5307>Fall<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> us.

O <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> you have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> from the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H1390>Gibeah:<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> they <S%H5975>stood:<s%> the <S%H4421>battle<s%> in <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5932>iniquity<s%> did not <S%H5381>overtake<s%> them.

It is in my <S%H183>desire<s%> that I should <S%H3256>chastise<s%> them; and the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall be <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them, when they shall <S%H631>bind<s%> themselves in their <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5869>furrows.<s%>

And <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> is as an <S%H5697>heifer<s%> that is <S%H3925>taught,<s%> and <S%H157>loves<s%> to <S%H1758>tread<s%> out the corn; but I <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> on her <S%H2898>fair<s%> <S%H6676>neck:<s%> I will make <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> to <S%H7392>ride;<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> shall <S%H2790>plow,<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> shall <S%H7702>break<s%> his <S%H7702>clods.<s%>

<S%H2232>Sow<s%> to yourselves in <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> <S%H7114>reap<s%> in <S%H2617>mercy;<s%> <S%H5214>break<s%> up your <S%H5215>fallow<s%> ground: for it is <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H1875>seek<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> he <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H3384>rain<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> on you.

You have <S%H2790>plowed<s%> <S%H7562>wickedness,<s%> you have <S%H7114>reaped<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity;<s%> you have <S%H398>eaten<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of <S%H3585>lies:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> you did <S%H982>trust<s%> in your <S%H1870>way,<s%> in the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of your <S%H1368>mighty<s%> men.

Therefore shall a <S%H7588>tumult<s%> <S%H6965>arise<s%> among your <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4013>fortresses<s%> shall be <S%H7703>spoiled,<s%> as <S%H8020>Shalman<s%> <S%H7701>spoiled<s%> <S%H1009>Betharbel<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H4421>battle:<s%> the <S%H517>mother<s%> was <S%H7376>dashed<s%> in pieces on her <S%H1121>children.<s%>

<S%H3602>So<s%> shall <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> to you <S%H6440>because<s%> of your <S%H7451>great<s%> <S%H7451>wickedness:<s%> in a <S%H7837>morning<s%> shall the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> utterly be <S%H1820>cut<s%> off.
